name: wp-content-eslint
description: ESLint configuration for WordPress plugins and themes

scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:php-js
scripts.lint:js:report: eslint --ext .js plugins/ themes/ --ignore-pattern 'plugins/graphic_data_plugin/admin/exopite-simple-options/**' --format json --output-file eslint-report.json || true
